rules_text:
Whenever you discover, double target creature's power and toughness until end of turn.
{4}{G}{G}: Discover 3. Activate only as a sorcery. [i](To discover 3, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Seeking first riches, now just a way out.[/i]
